description: This file defines API endpoints using FastAPI for protected resources that require authentication and authorization. It includes two endpoints: one that returns user identity information and another protected for admin roles.

methods.name: Dict[str,Any] protected_example(user: AuthenticatedUser = Depends(get_current_user))
methods.description: Returns basic identity information for the current authenticated user using a dependency injection of AuthenticatedUser.

methods.name: Dict[str,Any] protected_admin_example( user: AuthenticatedUser = Depends(require_roles(["admin", "realm-admin"])), )
methods.description: Returns a confirmation JSON if the user has at least one admin-related role, requiring role-based authorization.

ctags.name: protected_example
ctags.pattern: /^async def protected_example(user: AuthenticatedUser = Depends(get_current_user)) -> Dict[str, An/
